law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 16, effective July 1, 1954. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 5. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Rules governing administration and expenditure of equalization money by local boards; liability of local boards.
